Label: Public Service Management
Definition: Purposes associated with management of public services

Label: Public Service Eligibility Assessment
Definition: Purposes associated with assessing the eligibility of a person to receive or continue to receive public services

Label: Public Service Provision
Definition: Purposes associated with provision of public services

Label: Public Service Distribution Management
Definition: Purposes associated with managing the distribution in relation to public services, such as increasing, decreasing, granting, revoking, or reducing the service or related benefits

Label: Public Service Fraud Prevention Detection
Definition: Purposes associated with fraud detection and prevention in relation to public services

Label: Social Welfare Management
Definition: Purposes associated with management of social welfare

Label: Social Welfare Eligibility Assessment
Definition: Purposes associated with assessment of eligibility of a person to receive or continue to receive social welfare

Label: Social Welfare Provision
Definition: Purposes associated with provision of social welfare

Label: Social Welfare Distribution Management
Definition: Purposes associated with managing the distribution in relation to social welfare, such as increasing, decreasing, granting, revoking, or reducing the service or related benefits

Label: Social Welfare Enrolment Management
Definition: Purposes associated with enrolment and managing enrolment of persons for the purposes of providing social welfare

Label: Social Welfare Risk Assessment
Definition: Purposes associated with conducting risk and impact assessments in relation to use of social welfare

Label: Social Assistance Management
Definition: Purposes associated with management of social assistance services

Label: Housing Welfare Management
Definition: Purposes associated with management of housing as part of social assistance and welfare services

Label: Social Insurance Management
Definition: Purposes associated with management of social insurance as part of social assistance and welfare services

Label: Social Security Management
Definition: Purposes associated with management of social security as part of social assistance and welfare services
